locales.description: Honored to have you. If you work for the Club in any capacity, or if you are the club itself, an owner, et cetera - toggle this flat to ‘on.’
locales.name: St. Louis CITY SC Club (Official)

locales.description: You are a current Season Ticket Holder for St. Louis CITY SC. Congratulations!
locales.name: Season Ticket Holder

locales.description: You’ve been with the club since Day 1. Probably before, but definitely for Day 1.
locales.name: CITY Founder

locales.description: You cover or write about CITY SC (or soccer at any level) for a newspaper, footy website, or newsletter.
locales.name: CITY / Footy Media

locales.description: You are either the host, co-host, or are affiliated with a CITY SC Podcast or Videocast.
locales.name: CITY Podcast / Videocast
